input.sentences: these are some amazing photos from our wedding day in the chapel !
me and my lovely husband walking down the aisle here .
him feeding me the cake before we dance .
and we danced the night away hor hours .
me dancing with my father later .
output.sentences: The wedding was a beautiful one with everyone dressed in their finest clothes.
For the first time, the bride and groom were introduced together.
They shared their love over a piece of delicious cake as the husband fed his wife.
Their first dance was lovely, bringing many tears to eyes.
The bride danced with her father as they shared a poignant moment.
